Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 122 off 61 balls, his first international hundred in nearly three years
Miscellaneous Highlights: India bowed out of the Asia Cup with a massive 101-run win over Afghanistan
Others: Fast bowler Bhuvneshwar Kumar bowled one of best spells in Twenty20 cricket by grabbing 5-4 with his brilliant swing bowling upfront
